snippet.title: Rebots Demo Trailer (2022 February)
snippet.description:
Demo available at:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/993030/Rebots/

Rebots is a first-person resource management game where you transform the climate of asteroids to settle wacky alien clients. Expand their communities by building production loops, exploring the solar system and gathering & crafting resources with your crew of (mostly) intelligent Rebots.
----
Website: https://www.rebotsgame.com/
Discord: https://discord.gg/WuhWPwmjAC
Twitter: https://twitter.com/rebotsgame
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@flatponies
Facebook: https://facebook.com/flatponies
Instagram: https://instagram.com/flatponies
